name: mist_FA_reg
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Tool for registering FA volumes to a reference T1 volume

inputs.description: The FA volume to be registered.
inputs.name: FA volume

inputs.description: The S0 volume corresponding to the FA volume.
inputs.name: S0 volume

inputs.description: The reference T1 volume to register against.
inputs.name: Reference T1 volume

inputs.description: The output filename for the registered volume.
inputs.name: Output filename

output-files.description: Output file for the registered volume
output-files.name: Output file
